main_definition: ready and willing to agree with others or obey rules or requests.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Submissive, easily managed, or controlled by authority figures or external forces.
meanings_and_examples.example: The compliant employee always followed orders without question.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fully adhering to rules, guidelines, or standards set by an organization, institution, or individual.
meanings_and_examples.example: The hospital was very strict about infection control and all staff members were expected to be compliant with the policies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Able to adapt easily to changes or new situations.
meanings_and_examples.example: She is a very compliant student who quickly adjusts her study habits based on feedback from her teachers.
